==========980CN1_L055_M01_CMCC_S36_180910=========V3.6(无效标签)
------------------------------------------------------------------------
r16707 | chuang.xue | 2018-09-04 15:20:01 +0800 (二, 04  9月 2018) | 5 lines

modem patch MOLY00349625_ALPS04104867(For_AUS6739_66_N1_MOLY.LR12A.R2.MP.V1.P70)
Customer Request
MOLY00341075
當插入的SIM卡其EHPLMN個數大於20個(例如: RJIL的SIM), 在搜網過程中, 避免送出過多的internal message
When EHPLMN number is over 20 (ex. RJIL SIM), during PLMN search, avoid sending too much internal messages which results the other module's queue overflow
------------------------------------------------------------------------

r16521 | xingheng.du | 2018-08-27 10:08:53 +0800 (一, 27  8月 2018) | 4 lines

分支：主干
模块：指纹
修改：客户反馈：手机充电时，在没有来信息的情况下自动亮屏，不会自动灭屏(系统默认无操作1分钟后休眠)，手动按压电源键强制灭屏后，过10S 钟又自动亮屏
波及分析：指纹
------------------------------------------------------------------------

  Add a simple read-only counter to super_blo***hat indicates how deep this
  is ***he stack of filesys***s.  Previously ecryptfs was the only stackable
  filesys*** and it explicitly disallowed multiple layers of itself.
  
  [[Potential Impa*** of the solution]]
  Previously ecryptfs was the only stackable
  filesys*** and it explicitly disallowed multiple layers of itself.
  Limit the depth of the filesys*** stack.  Initially the limit is set to 2.

  [[Title for Customer]]
Open TCP_NODELAY in volte stack
[[Problem Description]]
In some CT case, for example TC-MF_VoLTE-VQ-01002, is strict with time delay between sip messages.
So we open TCP_NODELAY in volte stack, which can reduce time delay.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
TCP stack sends sip message directly without waiting TCP ACK.

volte

[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
ddm,data service
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
MOD_DDM
[[問題標題]]
APN protocl 设置问题
[[問題現象]]
1. SIMA set up a new APN (name:ctnet@mycdma.cn APN:ctnet,密码：vnet.mobi,MCC:  460, MNC: 03,IP Version: IPV4)
2. Select the APN, cheak data service
/*data service 可以正常使用*/
3. Set APN protocol is IPV6
4. Cheak data service
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
DDM data service
[[建議驗證模塊]]
MOD_DDM,
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libl4.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00312493
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Open TCP_NODELAY in volte stack
[[Problem Description]]
In some CT case, for example TC-MF_VoLTE-VQ-01002, is strict with time delay between sip messages.
So we open TCP_NODELAY in volte stack, which can reduce time delay.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
TCP stack sends sip message directly without waiting TCP ACK.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
volte
[[問題標題]]
Open TCP_NODELAY in volte stack
[[問題現象]]
In some CT case, for example TC-MF_VoLTE-VQ-01002, is strict with time delay between sip messages.
So we open TCP_NODELAY in volte stack, which can reduce time delay.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
TCP stack sends sip message directly without waiting TCP ACK.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
volte
Associated Files:
  apps/mtk_rel/GEN93_USER/libs/arm/volte_stack

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00326867
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
prefer report  ps domain when AP query PLMN using AT+EOPS?
[[Problem Description]]

when AP queried the PLMN L4 prefer report CS domain PLMN.
But in ALPS03906487, CS registered later than PS did. So when AP found out PLMN changed, but couldn,t receive URC EGREG, which was already reported when PS  registered happened.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
NO
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
l4b,atci,l4c
[[問題標題]]

when AP queried the PLMN L4 prefer report CS domain PLMN.
But in ALPS03906487, CS registered later than PS did. So when AP found out PLMN changed, but couldn,t receive URC EGREG, which was already reported when PS  registered happened.
[[問題現象]]
when AP queried the PLMN L4 prefer report CS domain PLMN.
But in ALPS03906487, CS registered later than PS did. So when AP found out PLMN changed, but couldn’t receive URC EGREG, which was already reported when PS  registered happened.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
no
[[建議驗證模塊]]
l4b,atci,l4c
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libl4.a

Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
CT+CMCC/CU, in C2K poor signal, sometimes UE can not receive the paging for GSM in SIM2
[[Problem Description]]
CT+CMCC/CU, in C2K poor signal, sometimes UE can not receive the paging for GSM in SIM2
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
impact the MT for C2K, because C2K can not make registration immediately
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
CT+CMCC/CU, make MT call in GSM 
[[問題標題]]
CT+CMCC/CU，C2K 在弱信号下，有时会影响另一张卡的paging
[[問題現象]]
CT+CMCC/CU，C2K 在弱信号下，有时会影响另一张卡的paging
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]

[[建議驗證模塊]]

CR ID:       MOLY00329348
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
CT+CMCC/CU, in C2K poor signal, sometimes UE can not receive the paging for GSM in SIM2
[[Problem Description]]
CT+CMCC/CU, in C2K poor signal, sometimes UE can not receive the paging for GSM in SIM2
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
impact the MT for C2K, because C2K can not make registration immediately
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
CT+CMCC/CU, make MT call in GSM 
[[問題標題]]
CT+CMCC/CU，C2K 在弱信号下，有时会影响另一张卡的paging
[[問題現象]]
CT+CMCC/CU，C2K 在弱信号下，有时会影响另一张卡的paging
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
由于C2K弱信号下，无法及时注册，可能会影响C2K 的寻呼
[[建議驗證模塊]]
CT+CMCC/CU， 做CMCC/CU上的被叫测试

  of co***igurations and ***erfaces that we could have allocated.

  User ***er*** is not needed for exploitation.

Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Solution to modem reboot in networks which support both LTE and C2K
[[Problem Description]]
In networks which support both LTE and C2K RAT, LTE could be suspended due to C2K signalling. There is a bug in which LTE enters a wrong internal state if UE fails to resume LTE after C2K signalling.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
No impact
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
No specific module
[[問題標題]]
在同時支援LTE與C2K的環境發生modem重啟之解決方案
[[問題現象]]
在同時支援LTE與C2K的環境下, 若C2K有控制面行為要處理, 可能會暫時suspend LTE, 目前已知有一個控制面相關的問題, 可能在C2K無法成功resume回LTE時導致modem重啟.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
無負面影響

無特定模塊

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00315070
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
MM send ACCESS_BARRED (when UE access is barred in that cell) event to NWSEL for PLMN search when SIM invalid for CS services but UE trying to register for PS services.
[[Problem Description]]
1. UE has SIM which is invalid for CS services.
2. Due to UE MS class, it is barred in a cell#1.
3. UE trying to register for PS services but UE stay in same access barred cell.
4. This causes UE not registered for PS services and UE not moving out of the barred cell.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
COPS command time out. 
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
MM
[[問題標題]]
MM send ACCESS_BARRED (when UE access is barred in that cell) event to NWSEL for PLMN search when SIM invalid for CS services but UE trying to register for PS services.
[[問題現象]]
1. UE has SIM which is invalid for CS services.
2. Due to UE MS class, it is barred in a cell#1.
3. UE trying to register for PS services but UE stay in same access barred cell.
4. This causes UE not registered for PS services and UE not moving out of the barred cell.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
COPS command time out. 
[[建議驗證模塊]]
MM
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libmm.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00322774
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
support CT auto-HVOLTE feature for subsidiary SIM
[[Problem Description]]
Scenario: Set CT SIM as non-data SIM, enable VOLTE
Problem: auto-HVOLTE feature does not work
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
non-data SIM does not support SRLTE. UE may be 1x out-of-service during LTE searching process
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Set CT SIM as non-data SIM, enable VOLTE:
1. Enter LTE coverage area, check if UE register on LTE
2. Enter non-LTE coverage area, check if UE register on 1x
3. Enter LTE coverage but IMS VOPS not supported area, check if UE register on 1x
4. Move UE from C2K only area to LTE only area, check if UE register on LTE
5. UE registered on 1x. Enter LTE & C2K coverage area, check if UE register on LTE after 1 hr 
[[問題標題]]
於副卡上支援CT auto-HVOLTE功能
[[問題現象]]
場景: 於CT副卡上打開VOLTE
問題: auto-HVOLTE功能不作用
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
副卡不支援SRLTE, 在LTE找網期間1x會處於無服務狀態.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
CT卡設為副卡, 打開VOLTE:
1. 進入LTE區域, 確認手機註冊上LTE
2. 進入無LTE區域, 確認手機註冊上1x
3. 進入有LTE但IMS VOPS不支援區域, 確認手機註冊上1x
4. 將手機從只有C2K的區域移動到只有LTE的區域, 確認手機註冊上LTE
5. 手機註冊上1x的狀況下, 移動到C2K & LTE都存在的區域, 確認一小時後手機註冊上LTE
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/liberrc.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request

Description:

support CT auto-HVOLTE feature for subsidiary SIM
[[Problem Description]]

non-data SIM does not support SRLTE. UE may be 1x out-of-service during LTE searching process
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Set CT SIM as non-data SIM, enable VOLTE:
1. Enter LTE coverage area, check if UE register on LTE
2. Enter non-LTE coverage area, check if UE register on 1x
3. Enter LTE coverage but IMS VOPS not supported area, check if UE register on 1x
4. Move UE from C2K only area to LTE only area, check if UE register on LTE
5. UE registered on 1x. Enter LTE & C2K coverage area, check if UE register on LTE after 1 hr 
[[問題標題]]
於副卡上支援CT auto-HVOLTE功能

問題: auto-HVOLTE功能不作用

1. 進入LTE區域, 確認手機註冊上LTE
2. 進入無LTE區域, 確認手機註冊上1x
3. 進入有LTE但IMS VOPS不支援區域, 確認手機註冊上1x
4. 將手機從只有C2K的區域移動到只有LTE的區域, 確認手機註冊上LTE
5. 手機註冊上1x的狀況下, 移動到C2K & LTE都存在的區域, 確認一小時後手機註冊上LTE

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00322782
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Handling RAU reject with cause #8(GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) according to TS 24.008 Rel 11.4.0 and above(CR 2297). Cause #8 is now handled similar to cause #3/#6(Illegal MS/ME)
[[Problem Description]]
RAU was rejected with cause#8 and is handled as abnormal RAU (in sync with TS 24.008 until Rel11.3) MM in the subsequent DETACH_IND sent GPRS is_reged parameter as TRUE (abnormal RAU handling does not set GPRS is_reged parameter as DETACHED) to RAC causing assert in RAC.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
Handles case where RAU is rejected with  cause#8 ( GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) in sync with 3GPP spec Rel11 onwards.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
MM
[[問題標題]]
Handling RAU reject with cause #8(GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) according to TS 24.008 Rel 11.4.0 and above(CR 2297). Cause #8 is now handled similar to cause #3/#6(Illegal MS/ME)
[[問題現象]]
RAU was rejected with cause#8 and is handled as abnormal RAU (in sync with TS 24.008 until Rel11.3) MM in the subsequent DETACH_IND sent GPRS is_reged parameter as TRUE (abnormal RAU handling does not set GPRS is_reged parameter as DETACHED) to RAC causing assert in RAC.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
Handles case where RAU is rejected with  cause#8 ( GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) in sync with 3GPP spec Rel11 onwards.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
MM
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libmm.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request

Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
modem EE when suspend procedure can not complete
[[Problem Description]]
c2k suspend procedure can not complete. which lead to Modem EE
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
no
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
test it in weak signal area without LTE signal. dial call from sim2.
watch sim 1 CT card can get normal service after call ended
[[問題標題]]

[[問題現象]]
C2K suspend流程未结束而导致死机
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
没有影响
[[建議驗證模塊]]
在没有LTE信号且X/DO弱信号环境下测试, 从sim 2打电话，挂断电话后观察sim 1 CT是否能够获得正常服务. 如此反复测试.

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00324577
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Handling RAU reject with cause #8(GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) according to TS 24.008 Rel 11.4.0 and above(CR 2297). Cause #8 is now handled similar to cause #3/#6(Illegal MS/ME)
[[Problem Description]]
RAU was rejected with cause#8 and is handled as abnormal RAU (in sync with TS 24.008 until Rel11.3) MM in the subsequent DETACH_IND sent GPRS is_reged parameter as TRUE (abnormal RAU handling does not set GPRS is_reged parameter as DETACHED) to RAC.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
Handles case where RAU is rejected with  cause#8 ( GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) in sync with 3GPP spec Rel11 onwards.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
RAU reject #8
[[問題標題]]
Handling RAU reject with cause #8(GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) according to TS 24.008 Rel 11.4.0 and above(CR 2297). Cause #8 is now handled similar to cause #3/#6(Illegal MS/ME)
[[問題現象]]
RAU was rejected with cause#8 and is handled as abnormal RAU (in sync with TS 24.008 until Rel11.3) MM in the subsequent DETACH_IND sent GPRS is_reged parameter as TRUE (abnormal RAU handling does not set GPRS is_reged parameter as DETACHED) to RAC.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
Handles case where RAU is rejected with  cause#8 ( GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) in sync with 3GPP spec Rel11 onwards.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
RAU reject #8
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libnwsel.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00326587
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Don't share the possible fake cell information to other SIM
[[Problem Description]]
One SIM can not camp on real cell because this cell is the possible fake cell for another SIM
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
No
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Verify other SIM can camp on normally after 1 SIM received TAU reject#13/15 without integrity
[[問題標題]]
不分享疑似假基站的資訊給其他SIM卡
[[問題現象]]
當一張卡認為該基站疑似假基站而暫時不選(但其實它可能是真基站),因有分享這個資訊給另一張卡,造成另一張卡也不選它
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
無
[[建議驗證模塊]]
兩張卡能正常選網
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/liberrc.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00329376
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Delay in obtaining PS Services
[[Problem Description]]
DUT could not obtain PS services on RAT_UMTS for a long time.
Observation
1> STACK_1 is MAIN_PS_STACK camped on RAT_UMTS
2> STACK_2 is NON_MAIN_PS_STACK camped on RAT_LTE
3> STACK_2 is prempting STACK_1 due to ERRC paging repeatedly

This preemption caused MAIN_PS_STACK to start and abort SYNC_RAU for 5 times (MAX_ATTEMPTS) and PS_SERVICES were disabled for T3302 time on STACK_1.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
NONE
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
GMM

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00298708
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Solution to modem reboot in networks which support both LTE and C2K
[[Problem Description]]
In networks which support both LTE and C2K RAT, LTE could be suspended due to C2K signalling. There is a bug in which LTE enters a wrong internal state if UE fails to resume LTE after C2K signalling.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
No impact
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
No specific module
[[問題標題]]
在同時支援LTE與C2K的環境發生modem重啟之解決方案
[[問題現象]]
在同時支援LTE與C2K的環境下, 若C2K有控制面行為要處理, 可能會暫時suspend LTE, 目前已知有一個控制面相關的問題, 可能在C2K無法成功resume回LTE時導致modem重啟.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
無負面影響
[[建議驗證模塊]]
無特定模塊
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libel2.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00315070
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
MM send ACCESS_BARRED (when UE access is barred in that cell) event to NWSEL for PLMN search when SIM invalid for CS services but UE trying to register for PS services.
[[Problem Description]]
1. UE has SIM which is invalid for CS services.
2. Due to UE MS class, it is barred in a cell#1.
3. UE trying to register for PS services but UE stay in same access barred cell.
4. This causes UE not registered for PS services and UE not moving out of the barred cell.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
COPS command time out. 
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
MM
[[問題標題]]
MM send ACCESS_BARRED (when UE access is barred in that cell) event to NWSEL for PLMN search when SIM invalid for CS services but UE trying to register for PS services.
[[問題現象]]
1. UE has SIM which is invalid for CS services.
2. Due to UE MS class, it is barred in a cell#1.
3. UE trying to register for PS services but UE stay in same access barred cell.
4. This causes UE not registered for PS services and UE not moving out of the barred cell.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
COPS command time out. 
[[建議驗證模塊]]
MM
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libmm.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00318864
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
The rove-out indication is not sent to UI when WFC call is ongoing and the WiFi RSSI values drop from good value to disconnected.
[[Problem Description]]
The rove-out indication is not sent when WiFi call is ongoing and the WiFi RSSI values drop from good value to disconnected and thus UI will not show the warning message.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
UI will show the warning message like "Your call may drop".
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
WFC call when WiFi signal is disconnected.
[[問題標題]]
The rove-out indication is not sent to UI when WFC call is ongoing and the WiFi RSSI values drop from good value to disconnected.
[[問題現象]]
The rove-out indication is not sent when WiFi call is ongoing and the WiFi RSSI values drop from good value to disconnected and thus UI will not show the warning message.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
UI will show the warning message like "Your call may drop".
[[建議驗證模塊]]

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00322774
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
support CT auto-HVOLTE feature for subsidiary SIM
[[Problem Description]]
Scenario: Set CT SIM as non-data SIM, enable VOLTE
Problem: auto-HVOLTE feature does not work
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
non-data SIM does not support SRLTE. UE may be 1x out-of-service during LTE searching process
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Set CT SIM as non-data SIM, enable VOLTE:
1. Enter LTE coverage area, check if UE register on LTE
2. Enter non-LTE coverage area, check if UE register on 1x
3. Enter LTE coverage but IMS VOPS not supported area, check if UE register on 1x
4. Move UE from C2K only area to LTE only area, check if UE register on LTE
5. UE registered on 1x. Enter LTE & C2K coverage area, check if UE register on LTE after 1 hr 
[[問題標題]]
於副卡上支援CT auto-HVOLTE功能
[[問題現象]]
場景: 於CT副卡上打開VOLTE
問題: auto-HVOLTE功能不作用
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
副卡不支援SRLTE, 在LTE找網期間1x會處於無服務狀態.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
CT卡設為副卡, 打開VOLTE:
1. 進入LTE區域, 確認手機註冊上LTE
2. 進入無LTE區域, 確認手機註冊上1x
3. 進入有LTE但IMS VOPS不支援區域, 確認手機註冊上1x
4. 將手機從只有C2K的區域移動到只有LTE的區域, 確認手機註冊上LTE
5. 手機註冊上1x的狀況下, 移動到C2K & LTE都存在的區域, 確認一小時後手機註冊上LTE
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/liberrc.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00322776
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
support CT auto-HVOLTE feature for subsidiary SIM
[[Problem Description]]
Scenario: Set CT SIM as non-data SIM, enable VOLTE
Problem: auto-HVOLTE feature does not work
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
non-data SIM does not support SRLTE. UE may be 1x out-of-service during LTE searching process
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Set CT SIM as non-data SIM, enable VOLTE:
1. Enter LTE coverage area, check if UE register on LTE
2. Enter non-LTE coverage area, check if UE register on 1x
3. Enter LTE coverage but IMS VOPS not supported area, check if UE register on 1x
4. Move UE from C2K only area to LTE only area, check if UE register on LTE
5. UE registered on 1x. Enter LTE & C2K coverage area, check if UE register on LTE after 1 hr 
[[問題標題]]
於副卡上支援CT auto-HVOLTE功能
[[問題現象]]
場景: 於CT副卡上打開VOLTE
問題: auto-HVOLTE功能不作用
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
副卡不支援SRLTE, 在LTE找網期間1x會處於無服務狀態.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
CT卡設為副卡, 打開VOLTE:
1. 進入LTE區域, 確認手機註冊上LTE
2. 進入無LTE區域, 確認手機註冊上1x
3. 進入有LTE但IMS VOPS不支援區域, 確認手機註冊上1x
4. 將手機從只有C2K的區域移動到只有LTE的區域, 確認手機註冊上LTE
5. 手機註冊上1x的狀況下, 移動到C2K & LTE都存在的區域, 確認一小時後手機註冊上LTE
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/liberrc.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00322782
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Handling RAU reject with cause #8(GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) according to TS 24.008 Rel 11.4.0 and above(CR 2297). Cause #8 is now handled similar to cause #3/#6(Illegal MS/ME)
[[Problem Description]]
RAU was rejected with cause#8 and is handled as abnormal RAU (in sync with TS 24.008 until Rel11.3) MM in the subsequent DETACH_IND sent GPRS is_reged parameter as TRUE (abnormal RAU handling does not set GPRS is_reged parameter as DETACHED) to RAC causing assert in RAC.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
Handles case where RAU is rejected with  cause#8 ( GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) in sync with 3GPP spec Rel11 onwards.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
MM
[[問題標題]]
Handling RAU reject with cause #8(GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) according to TS 24.008 Rel 11.4.0 and above(CR 2297). Cause #8 is now handled similar to cause #3/#6(Illegal MS/ME)
[[問題現象]]
RAU was rejected with cause#8 and is handled as abnormal RAU (in sync with TS 24.008 until Rel11.3) MM in the subsequent DETACH_IND sent GPRS is_reged parameter as TRUE (abnormal RAU handling does not set GPRS is_reged parameter as DETACHED) to RAC causing assert in RAC.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
Handles case where RAU is rejected with  cause#8 ( GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) in sync with 3GPP spec Rel11 onwards.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
MM
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libmm.a

[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
no
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00324577
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Handling RAU reject with cause #8(GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) according to TS 24.008 Rel 11.4.0 and above(CR 2297). Cause #8 is now handled similar to cause #3/#6(Illegal MS/ME)
[[Problem Description]]
RAU was rejected with cause#8 and is handled as abnormal RAU (in sync with TS 24.008 until Rel11.3) MM in the subsequent DETACH_IND sent GPRS is_reged parameter as TRUE (abnormal RAU handling does not set GPRS is_reged parameter as DETACHED) to RAC.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
Handles case where RAU is rejected with  cause#8 ( GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) in sync with 3GPP spec Rel11 onwards.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
RAU reject #8
[[問題標題]]
Handling RAU reject with cause #8(GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) according to TS 24.008 Rel 11.4.0 and above(CR 2297). Cause #8 is now handled similar to cause #3/#6(Illegal MS/ME)
[[問題現象]]
RAU was rejected with cause#8 and is handled as abnormal RAU (in sync with TS 24.008 until Rel11.3) MM in the subsequent DETACH_IND sent GPRS is_reged parameter as TRUE (abnormal RAU handling does not set GPRS is_reged parameter as DETACHED) to RAC.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
Handles case where RAU is rejected with  cause#8 ( GPRS and non-GPRS not allowed) in sync with 3GPP spec Rel11 onwards.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
RAU reject #8
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libnwsel.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00326587
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Don't share the possible fake cell information to other SIM
[[Problem Description]]
One SIM can not camp on real cell because this cell is the possible fake cell for another SIM
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
No
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Verify other SIM can camp on normally after 1 SIM received TAU reject#13/15 without integrity
[[問題標題]]
不分享疑似假基站的資訊給其他SIM卡
[[問題現象]]
當一張卡認為該基站疑似假基站而暫時不選(但其實它可能是真基站),因有分享這個資訊給另一張卡,造成另一張卡也不選它
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
無
[[建議驗證模塊]]
兩張卡能正常選網

  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/liberrc.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00329376
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Delay in obtaining PS Services
[[Problem Description]]
DUT could not obtain PS services on RAT_UMTS for a long time.
Observation
1> STACK_1 is MAIN_PS_STACK camped on RAT_UMTS
2> STACK_2 is NON_MAIN_PS_STACK camped on RAT_LTE
3> STACK_2 is prempting STACK_1 due to ERRC paging repeatedly

This preemption caused MAIN_PS_STACK to start and abort SYNC_RAU for 5 times (MAX_ATTEMPTS) and PS_SERVICES were disabled for T3302 time on STACK_1.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
NONE
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
GMM
[[問題標題]]
Delay in obtaining PS Services
[[問題現象]]
DUT could not obtain PS services on RAT_UMTS for a long time.
Observation
1> STACK_1 is MAIN_PS_STACK camped on RAT_UMTS
2> STACK_2 is NON_MAIN_PS_STACK camped on RAT_LTE
3> STACK_2 is prempting STACK_1 due to ERRC paging repeatedly

This preemption caused MAIN_PS_STACK to start and abort SYNC_RAU for 5 times (MAX_ATTEMPTS) and PS_SERVICES were disabled for T3302 time on STACK_1.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
NONE
[[建議驗證模塊]]
GMM

r14168 | chuang.xue | 2018-05-31 17:32:41 +0800 (四, 31  5月 2018) | 702 lines

modem patch MOLY00325550_ALPS03912015(For_AUS6739_66_N1_MOLY.LR12A.R2.MP.V1.P56)
#==============================================================================
# CR list from customer request
# ------------------------
# The release maybe include
#   1. The patch request from customer
#   2. The dependency patch of item 1
#==============================================================================

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00301790
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [MFC] CR for BM to check in MFC changes
Associated Files:

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00320317
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Issue SIM card burned
[[Problem Description]]
Issue SIM card become unavailable to use during testing CT test cases
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
(1) Delay Location Status during BIP Session
(2) BIP session may not be ended until plug-out or card drop if SIM doesn't send CLOSE CHANNEL somehow
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
SIM/SAT/UIM/UTK
[[問題標題]]
Issue SIM 卡燒卡問題
[[問題現象]]
在 CT 入庫測試時發現有 Issue SIM 卡發生燒卡現象，導致 SIM 卡無法使用
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
(1) 因為 BIP 當中皆無發送 Location Status，所以卡可能無法得到正確的狀態值
(2) BIP session 的結束條件為 成功執行CLOSE CHANNEL 或 重新查卡/掉卡等與卡相關的事件發生，但若 SIM 卡因為狀態問題導致一直沒有送 CLOSE CHANNEL，手機將會一直處在 BIP session 當中，也就無法下發 Location Status
[[建議驗證模塊]]
SIM/SAT/UIM/UTK

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00324309
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Allow EGACT and CGACT with MIN_CID value((can be CID 0 or CID 1 based on configuration)
[[Problem Description]]
PDN which gets created as part of lte attach procedure is normally assigned MIN_CID(can be CID 0 or CID 1 based on configuration). L4 expects that MIN_CID should be assigned to PDN which got activated as part LTE attach procedure and it rejects PDN activation requests from upper layers if PDN activation request comes for MIN_CID. Some networks have started to provide IMS PDN as part of LTE attach procedure and MIN_CID gets assinged to IMS PDN. As IMS call can do handover from WIFI to LTE and vice versa, uppler layers may trigger IMS PDN activation with MIN_CID during handover from WIFI to LTE if IMS PDN was activated as part of LTE attach procedure.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
No Impact
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
L4C_PS
[[問題標題]]
Allow EGACT and CGACT with MIN_CID value((can be CID 0 or CID 1 based on configuration)
[[問題現象]]
PDN which gets created as part of lte attach procedure is normally assigned MIN_CID(can be CID 0 or CID 1 based on configuration). L4 expects that MIN_CID should be assigned to PDN which got activated as part LTE attach procedure and it rejects PDN activation requests from upper layers if PDN activation request comes for MIN_CID. Some networks have started to provide IMS PDN as part of LTE attach procedure and MIN_CID gets assinged to IMS PDN. As IMS call can do handover from WIFI to LTE and vice versa, uppler layers may trigger IMS PDN activation with MIN_CID during handover from WIFI to LTE if IMS PDN was activated as part of LTE attach procedure.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
No Impact
[[建議驗證模塊]]
L4C_PS

modem patch MOLY00325550_ALPS03912015(For_AUS6739_66_N1_MOLY.LR12A.R2.MP.V1.P56) && 同步trunk 11540的fota升级，频繁掉网
#==============================================================================
# CR list from customer request
# ------------------------
# The release maybe include
#   1. The patch request from customer
#   2. The dependency patch of item 1
#==============================================================================

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00301790
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [MFC] CR for BM to check in MFC changes
Associated Files:

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00320317
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Issue SIM card burned
[[Problem Description]]
Issue SIM card become unavailable to use during testing CT test cases
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
(1) Delay Location Status during BIP Session
(2) BIP session may not be ended until plug-out or card drop if SIM doesn't send CLOSE CHANNEL somehow
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
SIM/SAT/UIM/UTK
[[問題標題]]
Issue SIM 卡燒卡問題
[[問題現象]]
在 CT 入庫測試時發現有 Issue SIM 卡發生燒卡現象，導致 SIM 卡無法使用
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
(1) 因為 BIP 當中皆無發送 Location Status，所以卡可能無法得到正確的狀態值
(2) BIP session 的結束條件為 成功執行CLOSE CHANNEL 或 重新查卡/掉卡等與卡相關的事件發生，但若 SIM 卡因為狀態問題導致一直沒有送 CLOSE CHANNEL，手機將會一直處在 BIP session 當中，也就無法下發 Location Status
[[建議驗證模塊]]
SIM/SAT/UIM/UTK

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00324309
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Allow EGACT and CGACT with MIN_CID value((can be CID 0 or CID 1 based on configuration)
[[Problem Description]]
PDN which gets created as part of lte attach procedure is normally assigned MIN_CID(can be CID 0 or CID 1 based on configuration). L4 expects that MIN_CID should be assigned to PDN which got activated as part LTE attach procedure and it rejects PDN activation requests from upper layers if PDN activation request comes for MIN_CID. Some networks have started to provide IMS PDN as part of LTE attach procedure and MIN_CID gets assinged to IMS PDN. As IMS call can do handover from WIFI to LTE and vice versa, uppler layers may trigger IMS PDN activation with MIN_CID during handover from WIFI to LTE if IMS PDN was activated as part of LTE attach procedure.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
No Impact
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
L4C_PS
[[問題標題]]
Allow EGACT and CGACT with MIN_CID value((can be CID 0 or CID 1 based on configuration)
[[問題現象]]
PDN which gets created as part of lte attach procedure is normally assigned MIN_CID(can be CID 0 or CID 1 based on configuration). L4 expects that MIN_CID should be assigned to PDN which got activated as part LTE attach procedure and it rejects PDN activation requests from upper layers if PDN activation request comes for MIN_CID. Some networks have started to provide IMS PDN as part of LTE attach procedure and MIN_CID gets assinged to IMS PDN. As IMS call can do handover from WIFI to LTE and vice versa, uppler layers may trigger IMS PDN activation with MIN_CID during handover from WIFI to LTE if IMS PDN was activated as part of LTE attach procedure.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
No Impact
[[建議驗證模塊]]
L4C_PS

r12524 | xingheng.du | 2018-04-20 14:05:22 +0800 (五, 20  4月 2018) | 11 lines

分支：主干
模块：frameworks
修改点：*）解决 CTS VERIFIER 中 ipv6 测试项问题，添加 CTS VERIFIER 这个apk 为白名单，由于待机功耗之前有修改过这块，DeviceIdleController.java 这个类处理。原来[FAQ20001] 如何将非系统app预置到Doze的白名单中，读取 deviceidle.xml 这个方式无效。

备注： 请检查分支下 vendor\google\products\gms_overlay\frameworks\base\core\res\res\values 以及frameworks\base\core\res\res\values

中config.xml :

<bool name="config_enableAutoPowerModes">true</bool>  -- 这个值需为 true

波及影响：仅此
------------------------------------------------------------------------

r12425 | xiaopeng.zhou | 2018-04-19 14:17:53 +0800 (四, 19  4月 2018) | 3 lines

修改点：*）芯启航指纹模组优化
------------------------------------------------------------------------
r12373 | zhijun.mo | 2018-04-18 18:43:42 +0800 (三, 18  4月 2018) | 6 lines

模块：CTS 要求
修改点：*）添加属性：ro.product.first_api_level ，这个属性谷歌新要求，主要目的：区分是不是first build。

备注：Build.VERSION.SDK_INT是OS 的SDK version，是默认就有的，如果os升级上去了，它也会跟着升级，举个例子8.0的sdk是26，8.1的是27，如果first build是8.0的，后面MR升到了8.1，这个值需要修改为27

波及影响：仅此
------------------------------------------------------------------------

r9586 | xiaopeng.zhou | 2018-03-09 17:35:07 +0800 (五, 09  3月 2018) | 3 lines

分支：CMCC
模块：指纹相关
修改点：*）     此问题由于指纹索引fingerprint.txt文件丢失（具体丢失原因，暂时无法查明，目前猜测文件系统问题），导致找不到指纹ID，无法正常上报识别成功消息。此次修改去掉了fingerprint.txt文件，将指纹ID通过属性存储，避免因文件丢失导致指纹无法使用问题

[[問題標題]]
插入IDEA-INA卡，当数据开关关闭时，查询呼叫转移时手机会进行CSFB
[[問題現象]]
插入IDEA-INA卡，当数据开关关闭时，查询呼叫转移时手机会进行CSFB
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00304356
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
The USSD is not sent to the network and an error with INVALID OPERATION was returned to AP.
[[Problem Description]]
The issue was that the UE did not perform the SAT USSD operation by sending the USSD request to the network this is because the CSMSS did not invoke the setup_ussd_struct() function and hence the CSM will return MSG_ID_L4CCSM_CISS_SS_PARSE_CNF with the result as INVALID OPERATION.
The CSMSS did not invoke the function setup_ussd_struct()because of the coding error, i.e. in the function process_interrogation(), if the SBP, SBP_INTERROGATE_GROUPS_OF_SS is enabled then the setup_ussd_struct() is not called to send the USSD to the network, and hence the error value was returned.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
No impact or side effect.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
CSM SS
[[問題標題]]
The USSD is not sent to the network and an error with INVALID OPERATION was returned to AP.
[[問題現象]]
The issue was that the UE did not perform the SAT USSD operation by sending the USSD request to the network this is because the CSMSS did not invoke the setup_ussd_struct() function and hence the CSM will return MSG_ID_L4CCSM_CISS_SS_PARSE_CNF with the result as INVALID OPERATION.
The CSMSS did not invoke the function setup_ussd_struct()because of the coding error, i.e. in the function process_interrogation(), if the SBP, SBP_INTERROGATE_GROUPS_OF_SS is enabled then the setup_ussd_struct() is not called to send the USSD to the network, and hence the error value was returned.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
No impact or side effect.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
CSM SS
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libl4.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00304356
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
The USSD is not sent to the network and an error with INVALID OPERATION was returned to AP.
[[Problem Description]]
The issue was that the UE did not perform the SAT USSD operation by sending the USSD request to the network this is because the CSMSS did not invoke the setup_ussd_struct() function and hence the CSM will return MSG_ID_L4CCSM_CISS_SS_PARSE_CNF with the result as INVALID OPERATION.
The CSMSS did not invoke the function setup_ussd_struct()because of the coding error, i.e. in the function process_interrogation(), if the SBP, SBP_INTERROGATE_GROUPS_OF_SS is enabled then the setup_ussd_struct() is not called to send the USSD to the network, and hence the error value was returned.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
No impact or side effect.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
CSM SS
[[問題標題]]
The USSD is not sent to the network and an error with INVALID OPERATION was returned to AP.
[[問題現象]]
The issue was that the UE did not perform the SAT USSD operation by sending the USSD request to the network this is because the CSMSS did not invoke the setup_ussd_struct() function and hence the CSM will return MSG_ID_L4CCSM_CISS_SS_PARSE_CNF with the result as INVALID OPERATION.
The CSMSS did not invoke the function setup_ussd_struct()because of the coding error, i.e. in the function process_interrogation(), if the SBP, SBP_INTERROGATE_GROUPS_OF_SS is enabled then the setup_ussd_struct() is not called to send the USSD to the network, and hence the error value was returned.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
No impact or side effect.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
CSM SS
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libl4.a

解決D4U5 UL64QAM在handover時的bug
[[問題現象]]
解決D4U5 UL64QAM在handover時的bug
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
no
[[建議驗證模塊]]
當category為D4U5 or cat4 且PLMN沒有在white list中，檢查handover是否正常
Associated Files:
  mcu/pcore/custom/modem/common/ps/custom_eas_config.c
  mcu/pcore/custom/modem/common/ps/custom_eas_config.h

  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libddm.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00304463
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
IMS de-register change for H3G UK
[[Problem Description]]
H3G UK requires that IMS de-register should be triggered
when UE goes to weak WiFi area and rove out threshold value
is reached. This does not happen.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
IMS de-register is triggered when UE goes to weak WiFi area and rove out threshold value is reached.
NVRAM pacth, NVRAM_EF_IWLAN_PROFILE_LID structure/default values changed and LID VERNO has been incremented accordingly.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
IMS registration and de-registration in WiFi when there is no cellular coverage, and UE goes to weak WiFi area and rove out threshold value is reached.
[[問題標題]]
IMS de-register change for H3G UK
[[問題現象]]
H3G UK requires that IMS de-register should be triggered
when UE goes to weak WiFi area and rove out threshold value
is reached. This does not happen.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
IMS de-register is triggered when UE goes to weak WiFi area and rove out threshold value is reached.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
IMS registration and de-registration in WiFi when there is no cellular coverage, and UE goes to weak WiFi area and rove out threshold value is reached.

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00304463
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
IMS de-register change for H3G UK
[[Problem Description]]
H3G UK requires that IMS de-register should be triggered
when UE goes to weak WiFi area and rove out threshold value
is reached. This does not happen.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
IMS de-register is triggered when UE goes to weak WiFi area and rove out threshold value is reached.
NVRAM pacth, NVRAM_EF_IWLAN_PROFILE_LID structure/default values changed and LID VERNO has been incremented accordingly.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
IMS registration and de-registration in WiFi when there is no cellular coverage, and UE goes to weak WiFi area and rove out threshold value is reached.
[[問題標題]]
IMS de-register change for H3G UK
[[問題現象]]
H3G UK requires that IMS de-register should be triggered
when UE goes to weak WiFi area and rove out threshold value
is reached. This does not happen.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
IMS de-register is triggered when UE goes to weak WiFi area and rove out threshold value is reached.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
IMS registration and de-registration in WiFi when there is no cellular coverage, and UE goes to weak WiFi area and rove out threshold value is reached.

CR ID:       MOLY00305651
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
SIM2 always no show ETWS message.
[[Problem Description]]
SIM2 always do not show ETWS message on LTE as previously we didn't have support for L+L configuration but this branch supports L+L due to this we enabled ETWS for LTE only on one protocol stack.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
None
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
L4
[[問題標題]]
SIM2 always no show ETWS message.
[[問題現象]]
SIM2 always do not show ETWS message on LTE as previously we didn't have support for L+L configuration but this branch supports L+L due to this we enabled ETWS for LTE only on one protocol stack.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
None
[[建議驗證模塊]]
L4
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libl4.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00306785
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
[L+L] Slave SIM (CT) cannot register on network.
[[Problem Description]]
On L+L project, disable the 4G data of Slave SIM (CT) and then reset the SIM, it cannot register on network.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
N/A
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
MOD_GMSS. 
Reproduce steps:
1. Insert SIM A as CT 4G, SIM B as CU 4G
2. Disable "Enable 4G data" of SIMA
3. Mobile data set to SIM B
4. Reset SIM A
5. Check UI
[[問題標題]]
[L+L] 副卡(CT) 無法註冊網路。
[[問題現象]]
在L+L啟用時，當資料設定在主卡，副卡(CT)沒有開啟4G data功能後又重置副卡時，副卡無法註冊網路。
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
無
[[建議驗證模塊]]
MOD_GMSS. 
覆驗步驟
1. 插入 SIM A CT 4G卡, SIM B CU 4G卡
2. 將SIM A 的 "Enable 4G data" 關閉
3. 將資料服務設定在SIM B
4. 重置SIM A
5. 檢查UI
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libgmss.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00306785
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
[L+L] Slave SIM (CT) cannot register on network.
[[Problem Description]]
On L+L project, disable the 4G data of Slave SIM (CT) and then reset the SIM, it cannot register on network.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
N/A
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
MOD_GMSS. 
Reproduce steps:
1. Insert SIM A as CT 4G, SIM B as CU 4G
2. Disable "Enable 4G data" of SIMA
3. Mobile data set to SIM B
4. Reset SIM A
5. Check UI
[[問題標題]]
[L+L] 副卡(CT) 無法註冊網路。
[[問題現象]]
在L+L啟用時，當資料設定在主卡，副卡(CT)沒有開啟4G data功能後又重置副卡時，副卡無法註冊網路。
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
無
[[建議驗證模塊]]
MOD_GMSS. 
覆驗步驟
1. 插入 SIM A CT 4G卡, SIM B CU 4G卡
2. 將SIM A 的 "Enable 4G data" 關閉
3. 將資料服務設定在SIM B
4. 重置SIM A
5. 檢查UI
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libgmss.a

  ***电话，包括VoLTE电话，和非VoLTE电话N/A

Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Fix call forwarding fail issue after changing phone's time settings
[[Problem Description]]
When users change phone's time later than GBA key expire time, IMS supplementary service fails.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
None
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
IMS SS
[[問題標題]]
解決更改手機時間後, 補充業務失敗問題
[[問題現象]]
使用者將手機時間更改至GBA 鑒證到期之後(如一天之後), 執行補充業務會失敗
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
無

r8091 | zhijun.mo | 2018-02-08 13:50:59 +0800 (四, 08  2月 2018) | 22 lines

模块：faramework
修改点：*）解决CTS 7项 FAIL

com.android.cts.net.HostsideRestrictBackgroundNetworkTests

#testAppIdleMetered_whenCharging

#testAppIdleNonMetered_whenCharging

#testBatterySaverModeMetered_enabled

#testBatterySaverModeMetered_whitelisted

#testBatterySaverModeNonMetered_enabled

#testBatterySaverModeNonMetered_whitelisted

#testDataAndBatterySaverModes_meteredNetwork

备注：此case 是由于，测试时候会进入到省电模式，而CMCC 白皮书中有要求，省电模式必须关掉wifi,故导致测试FAIL(CASE 要求wifi 不能断开)。解决方案，是根据是否是CTS 测试，规避CTS测试时候会走关闭wifi的流程

波及影响：仅此
------------------------------------------------------------------------
r8077 | xingheng.du | 2018-02-07 22:48:05 +0800 (三, 07  2月 2018) | 1 line

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00302030
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Local tones heard at UE instead of network in-band tones.
[[Problem Description]]
The issue was that the user heard a different tone than the normal inband tone and this was because the modem did not report the is_ibt = 1 (which means that the in-band tones are available during the Alerting phase) although the network reported the in-band tones available in the ALERTING message.
The in-band tone was not heard during the alerting phase because the network did not establish the traffic channel and hence the information regarding the availability of in-band tones in the ALERTING phase was not informed to the AP (i.e. is_ibt=0 in +ECPI:<call id>, 2). 
So when the network established the traffic channel, and CC got the SYNC indication the modem did not report is_ibt = 1 to the AP because there is a known bug in the modem
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
No impact or side effect and AP changes are also checked in.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
L4 - call
[[問題標題]]
Local tones heard at UE instead of network in-band tones.
[[問題現象]]
The issue was that the user heard a different tone than the normal inband tone and this was because the modem did not report the is_ibt = 1 (which means that the in-band tones are available during the Alerting phase) although the network reported the in-band tones available in the ALERTING message.
The in-band tone was not heard during the alerting phase because the network did not establish the traffic channel and hence the information regarding the availability of in-band tones in the ALERTING phase was not informed to the AP (i.e. is_ibt=0 in +ECPI:<call id>, 2). 
So when the network established the traffic channel, and CC got the SYNC indication the modem did not report is_ibt = 1 to the AP because there is a known bug in the modem
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
No impact or side effect and AP changes are also checked in.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
L4 - call
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libl4.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00302500
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
IMS PDN handover related bug fix
[[Problem Description]]
After SIM2 plug out/in, WFC may not able to register
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
No
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Turn both mobile data and VoLTE on, deact internet PDN with mobile data on (e.g. plug out SIM2), trigger IMS handover to WiFi.
[[問題標題]]
IMS PDN handover related bug fix
[[問題現象]]
After SIM2 plug out/in, WFC may not able to register
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
No
[[建議驗證模塊]]
Turn both mobile data and VoLTE on, deact internet PDN with mobile data on (e.g. plug out SIM2), trigger IMS handover to WiFi.
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libddm.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00304866
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
If a cell is barred, disable the optimisation for frequency scanning
[[Problem Description]]
Scenario;
a. Cell1(UARFCN1), CEll2(UARFCN2) are part of same PLMN (PLMN1)
b. Cell1 barred, Cell2 not barred
c. User PLMN triggered and Cell1 is found
Issue;
a. Since Cell1 is barred, Cell1 is not reported
b. As part of user plmn optimization, all frequencies which are part of PLMN1 are excluded from scanning.
c. Hence, UARFCN2 is not scanned and Cell2 is not found
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
User PLMN search time
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
CSE(Specifically user PLMN search)
[[問題標題]]
If a cell is barred, disable the optimisation for frequency scanning
[[問題現象]]
Scenario;
a. Cell1(UARFCN1), CEll2(UARFCN2) are part of same PLMN (PLMN1)
b. Cell1 barred, Cell2 not barred
c. User PLMN triggered and Cell1 is found
Issue;
a. Since Cell1 is barred, Cell1 is not reported
b. As part of user plmn optimization, all frequencies which are part of PLMN1 are excluded from scanning.
c. Hence, UARFCN2 is not scanned and Cell2 is not found
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
User PLMN search time
[[建議驗證模塊]]
CSE(Specifically user PLMN search)
Associated Files:

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00304916
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
add SBP option SBP_FAST_MCC_JUDGEMENT to enable/disable fast mcc judgement for CT operator
[[Problem Description]]
Scenario: UE with CT SIM leaves flight mode and check registration latency 
Problem: UE register latency does not satisfy CT criteria
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
Enable SBP_FAST_MCC_JUDGEMENT : CT SIM registration latency in China area would be 0.2 secs faster, CT SIM registration latency at border of China and other country may be 30~40 secs slower with low probability
Disable SBP_FAST_MCC_JUDGEMENT : CT SIM registration latency in China area would be 0.2 secs slower, CT SIM registration latency at border of China and other country would be normal
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
1. UE with CT SIM enter/leave flight mode in China, check if registration latency is acceptable
2. UE with CT SIM enter/leave flight mode at border of China and Hong-Kong, check if registration latency is acceptable
[[問題標題]]
新增SBP SBP_FAST_MCC_JUDGEMENT開關決定是否要針對電信啟用fast MCC judgement
[[問題現象]]
場景: 手機插CT SIM出flight mode, 確認註網時延
問題: 註網時延不滿足CT要求
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
打開SBP_FAST_MCC_JUDGEMENT: CT SIM在中國境內可以快0.2秒註冊成功, 在中國及其他國家邊境低機率註冊會慢30~40秒
關閉SBP_FAST_MCC_JUDGEMENT: CT SIM在中國境內會慢0.2秒註冊成功, 在中國及其他國家邊境註冊時間正常
[[建議驗證模塊]]
1. 手機插CT SIM於中國境內進出flight mode, 確認註網時延是否可接受
2. 手機插CT SIM於中國及香港邊界進出flight mode, 確認註網時延是否可接受
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libgmss.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00304931
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Protection of frequency adjustment when frequency error between eNB out of 3GPP SPEC (<0.6ppm)
[[Problem Description]]
Original frequency adjustment flow can only cover SPEC criterion.
Frequency error between eNB is about 2ppm in this location.
Call drop when UE handover, and there is large frequency offset between two cells. 
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
No impact
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Handover between large frequency offset cells, suggest same location.
[[問題標題]]
當兩基地台頻偏差距超出3GPP SPEC規範(0.6ppm), 增加頻率調整保護機制
[[問題現象]]
正常頻偏調整機制適用於頻偏符合SPEC規範之基地台
當地基地台頻偏大約是2ppm
UE在兩基地台頻偏過大的環境進行換手之後, 導致掉話
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
沒有
[[建議驗證模塊]]
在頻偏差距過大的基地台間進行換手, 建議在當地進行複測
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libel1d.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00305323
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
An improvement in 3G-FDD network search when no network service is available
[[Problem Description]]
Memory corruption KE when doing aging test.
Reproduce rate = a few among 200 devices within 24 hours.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
The issue exists in MT6763 and 3G-FDD initial cell search only.
3G-FDD SW control for 3G initial cell search when no available network service is modified.
3G initial cell search is executed only when boot-up, reboot, leaving flight mode, or leaving no service area, so the risk is expected to be low.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Test under no service environment and trigger 3G FDD initial cell search
Enter and leave flight mode
Boot up and reboot
[[問題標題]]
An improvement in 3G-FDD network search when no network service is available
[[問題現象]]
Memory corruption KE when doing aging test.
Reproduce rate = a few among 200 devices within 24 hours.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
The issue exists in MT6763 and 3G-FDD initial cell search only.
3G-FDD SW control for 3G initial cell search when no available network service is modified.
3G initial cell search is executed only when boot-up, reboot, leaving flight mode, or leaving no service area, so the risk is expected to be low.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
Test under no service environment and trigger 3G FDD initial cell search
Enter and leave flight mode
Boot up and reboot

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00302030
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Local tones heard at UE instead of network in-band tones.
[[Problem Description]]
The issue was that the user heard a different tone than the normal inband tone and this was because the modem did not report the is_ibt = 1 (which means that the in-band tones are available during the Alerting phase) although the network reported the in-band tones available in the ALERTING message.
The in-band tone was not heard during the alerting phase because the network did not establish the traffic channel and hence the information regarding the availability of in-band tones in the ALERTING phase was not informed to the AP (i.e. is_ibt=0 in +ECPI:<call id>, 2). 
So when the network established the traffic channel, and CC got the SYNC indication the modem did not report is_ibt = 1 to the AP because there is a known bug in the modem
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
No impact or side effect and AP changes are also checked in.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
L4 - call
[[問題標題]]
Local tones heard at UE instead of network in-band tones.
[[問題現象]]
The issue was that the user heard a different tone than the normal inband tone and this was because the modem did not report the is_ibt = 1 (which means that the in-band tones are available during the Alerting phase) although the network reported the in-band tones available in the ALERTING message.
The in-band tone was not heard during the alerting phase because the network did not establish the traffic channel and hence the information regarding the availability of in-band tones in the ALERTING phase was not informed to the AP (i.e. is_ibt=0 in +ECPI:<call id>, 2). 
So when the network established the traffic channel, and CC got the SYNC indication the modem did not report is_ibt = 1 to the AP because there is a known bug in the modem
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
No impact or side effect and AP changes are also checked in.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
L4 - call
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libl4.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00303946
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
mtkrild:AT command pending too long. assert!!! AT cmd: COPS.timer: 900000ms
[[Problem Description]]
Providing 1 sec gap when 2G is active RAT and in Virtual Standby state when no other activity is done by other SIMs RAT 2G. This scenario further causing 3G PLMN search delayed.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
It doesn't impact any other module's performance. 
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Modem 2G
[[問題標題]]
mtkrild:AT command pending too long. assert!!! AT cmd: COPS.timer: 900000ms
[[問題現象]]
Providing 1 sec gap when 2G is active RAT and in Virtual Standby state when no other activity is done by other SIMs RAT 2G. This scenario further causing 3G PLMN search delayed.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
It doesn't impact any other module's performance. 
[[建議驗證模塊]]

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00304866
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
If a cell is barred, disable the optimisation for frequency scanning
[[Problem Description]]
Scenario;
a. Cell1(UARFCN1), CEll2(UARFCN2) are part of same PLMN (PLMN1)
b. Cell1 barred, Cell2 not barred
c. User PLMN triggered and Cell1 is found
Issue;
a. Since Cell1 is barred, Cell1 is not reported
b. As part of user plmn optimization, all frequencies which are part of PLMN1 are excluded from scanning.
c. Hence, UARFCN2 is not scanned and Cell2 is not found
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
User PLMN search time
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
CSE(Specifically user PLMN search)
[[問題標題]]
If a cell is barred, disable the optimisation for frequency scanning
[[問題現象]]
Scenario;
a. Cell1(UARFCN1), CEll2(UARFCN2) are part of same PLMN (PLMN1)
b. Cell1 barred, Cell2 not barred
c. User PLMN triggered and Cell1 is found
Issue;
a. Since Cell1 is barred, Cell1 is not reported
b. As part of user plmn optimization, all frequencies which are part of PLMN1 are excluded from scanning.
c. Hence, UARFCN2 is not scanned and Cell2 is not found
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
User PLMN search time
[[建議驗證模塊]]
CSE(Specifically user PLMN search)
Associated Files:

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00304916
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
add SBP option SBP_FAST_MCC_JUDGEMENT to enable/disable fast mcc judgement for CT operator
[[Problem Description]]
Scenario: UE with CT SIM leaves flight mode and check registration latency 
Problem: UE register latency does not satisfy CT criteria
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
Enable SBP_FAST_MCC_JUDGEMENT : CT SIM registration latency in China area would be 0.2 secs faster, CT SIM registration latency at border of China and other country may be 30~40 secs slower with low probability
Disable SBP_FAST_MCC_JUDGEMENT : CT SIM registration latency in China area would be 0.2 secs slower, CT SIM registration latency at border of China and other country would be normal
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
1. UE with CT SIM enter/leave flight mode in China, check if registration latency is acceptable
2. UE with CT SIM enter/leave flight mode at border of China and Hong-Kong, check if registration latency is acceptable
[[問題標題]]
新增SBP SBP_FAST_MCC_JUDGEMENT開關決定是否要針對電信啟用fast MCC judgement
[[問題現象]]
場景: 手機插CT SIM出flight mode, 確認註網時延
問題: 註網時延不滿足CT要求
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
打開SBP_FAST_MCC_JUDGEMENT: CT SIM在中國境內可以快0.2秒註冊成功, 在中國及其他國家邊境低機率註冊會慢30~40秒
關閉SBP_FAST_MCC_JUDGEMENT: CT SIM在中國境內會慢0.2秒註冊成功, 在中國及其他國家邊境註冊時間正常
[[建議驗證模塊]]
1. 手機插CT SIM於中國境內進出flight mode, 確認註網時延是否可接受
2. 手機插CT SIM於中國及香港邊界進出flight mode, 確認註網時延是否可接受
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libgmss.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00304931
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Protection of frequency adjustment when frequency error between eNB out of 3GPP SPEC (<0.6ppm)
[[Problem Description]]
Original frequency adjustment flow can only cover SPEC criterion.
Frequency error between eNB is about 2ppm in this location.
Call drop when UE handover, and there is large frequency offset between two cells. 
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
No impact
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Handover between large frequency offset cells, suggest same location.
[[問題標題]]
當兩基地台頻偏差距超出3GPP SPEC規範(0.6ppm), 增加頻率調整保護機制
[[問題現象]]
正常頻偏調整機制適用於頻偏符合SPEC規範之基地台
當地基地台頻偏大約是2ppm
UE在兩基地台頻偏過大的環境進行換手之後, 導致掉話
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
沒有
[[建議驗證模塊]]
在頻偏差距過大的基地台間進行換手, 建議在當地進行複測
Associated Files:
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libel1d.a

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00305017
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
LTE to GSM csfb improvement.
[[Problem Description]]

[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
MP/MT CSFB LTE to GSM
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
GSM
[[問題標題]]
LTE to GSM csfb improvement.
[[問題現象]]
During redirection while Stored search, GAS was avoiding selection of cell whose BSIC do not match with the cell info present in successful CSFB cell list for same ARFCN.

[[建議驗證模塊]]

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00305323
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
An improvement in 3G-FDD network search when no network service is available
[[Problem Description]]
Memory corruption KE when doing aging test.
Reproduce rate = a few among 200 devices within 24 hours.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
The issue exists in MT6763 and 3G-FDD initial cell search only.
3G-FDD SW control for 3G initial cell search when no available network service is modified.
3G initial cell search is executed only when boot-up, reboot, leaving flight mode, or leaving no service area, so the risk is expected to be low.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Test under no service environment and trigger 3G FDD initial cell search
Enter and leave flight mode
Boot up and reboot
[[問題標題]]
An improvement in 3G-FDD network search when no network service is available
[[問題現象]]
Memory corruption KE when doing aging test.
Reproduce rate = a few among 200 devices within 24 hours.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
The issue exists in MT6763 and 3G-FDD initial cell search only.
3G-FDD SW control for 3G initial cell search when no available network service is modified.
3G initial cell search is executed only when boot-up, reboot, leaving flight mode, or leaving no service area, so the risk is expected to be low.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
Test under no service environment and trigger 3G FDD initial cell search
Enter and leave flight mode
Boot up and reboot
Associated Files:

r7539 | zhijun.mo | 2018-02-01 15:18:08 +0800 (四, 01  2月 2018) | 9 lines

模块：AMS
修改点：*）解决 当使用tclcamera，打开main2 （使用广角功能），back or home 退出到后台，此时去设置中设置人脸，成像倒像问题。

分析：此问题是由于，当打开main2 转入后台时候，debug.camera.open 属性值没被设置为-1，从而出现成像倒的情况（CTS 修改相关引入）。

备注：请测试同事，着重测试，除使用人脸外，比如使用微信，QQ或其它打开camera 的应用，看是否有此问题

波及影响：未知，后续着重测试

r7344 | chuang.xue | 2018-01-30 21:18:21 +0800 (二, 30  1月 2018) | 52 lines

modem patch MOLY00300441_ALPS03754833(For_AUS6739_66_N1_MOLY.LR12A.R2.MP.V1.P32)
#==============================================================================
# CR list from customer request
# ------------------------
# The release maybe include
#   1. The patch request from customer
#   2. The dependency patch of item 1
#==============================================================================

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00302644
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
change design for ecc_custom_support_enhance_retry API
[[Problem Description]]
HW didn't support the W capability. L4 do ECC retry change rat to 3G. Then, modem occur fatal error.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
N/A
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
L4
[[問題標題]]
change design for ecc_custom_support_enhance_retry API
[[問題現象]]
change design for ecc_custom_support_enhance_retry API
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
[Root cause &solution]
If HW didn't support the W capability. L4 can't do ECC retry change rat to 3G.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
change design for ecc_custom_support_enhance_retry API
[[Title for Customer]]
change design for ecc_custom_support_enhance_retry API
[[Problem Description]]
If L4 do ECC change retry rat and set rat mode to WCDMA in protocol 2, modem will occur fatal error.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
N/A
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
L4
[[問題標題]]
修改ecc_custom_support_enhance_retry API的設計
[[問題現象]]
當L4嘗試在protocol 2做ECC change rat retry時將rat mode設定到W時，modem會發生fatal error
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
N/A
[[建議驗證模塊]]
L4
Associated Files:
  mcu/pcore/custom/modem/common/custom_ecc.c
  mcu/pcore/custom/modem/common/custom_ecc.h
  mtk_rel/AUS6739_66_N1/LWCTG/lib/libl4.a

Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Enable handover lock for Swisscom
[[Problem Description]]
The phone keeps performing registration to VoWifi and back to
VoLTE sometimes in a very short time (2 or 3 seconds) Ping-Pong effect.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
Phone does perform registration to VoWifi and back to VoLTE in a very short time (2 or 3 seconds).
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
IMS registration handover scenarios when VoLTE and WFC is enabled and WiFi or cellular signal is low.

[[Potential Impact of the solution]]

SIM
[[問題標題]]
Fix the DSS not reset and hotswap poll timer conflict issue
[[問題現象]]
The modem assert due to try to cancel timer with incorrect event id
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
The hotswap poll timer will not set during the SIM switch.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
SIM

r6956 | wei.shi | 2018-01-26 13:47:56 +0800 (五, 26  1月 2018) | 165 lines

模块：patch
修改：*）ALPS03751088(For_aus6739_66_n1_alps-mp-n1.mp18-V1_P46)
=========================================================================================

#
# Copyright (C) 2008 The Android Open Source Project
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.
#

#
# Handle various build version information.
#
# Guarantees that the following are defined:
#     PLATFORM_VERSION
#     PLATFORM_SDK_VERSION
#     PLATFORM_VERSION_CODENAME
#     DEFAULT_APP_TARGET_SDK
#     BUILD_ID
#     BUILD_NUMBER
#     BUILD_DATETIME
#     PLATFORM_SECURITY_PATCH
#

# Look for an optional file containing overrides of the defaults,
# but don't cry if we don't find it.  We could just use -include, but
# the build.prop target also wants INTERNAL_BUILD_ID_MAKEFILE to be set
# if the file exists.
#
INTERNAL_BUILD_ID_MAKEFILE := $(wildcard $(BUILD_SYSTEM)/build_id.mk)
ifneq "" "$(INTERNAL_BUILD_ID_MAKEFILE)"
  include $(INTERNAL_BUILD_ID_MAKEFILE)
endif

ifeq "" "$(PLATFORM_VERSION)"
  # This is the canonical definition of the platform version,
  # which is the version that we reveal to the end user.
  # Update this value when the platform version changes (rather
  # than overriding it somewhere else).  Can be an arbitrary string.
  PLATFORM_VERSION := 7.1.1
endif

ifeq "" "$(PLATFORM_SDK_VERSION)"
  # This is the canonical definition of the SDK version, which defines
  # the set of APIs and functionality available in the platform.  It
  # is a single integer that increases monotonically as updates to
  # the SDK are released.  It should only be incremented when the APIs for
  # the new release are frozen (so that developers don't write apps against
  # intermediate builds).  During development, this number remains at the
  # SDK version the branch is based on and PLATFORM_VERSION_CODENAME holds
  # the code-name of the new development work.
  PLATFORM_SDK_VERSION := 25
endif

ifeq "" "$(PLATFORM_JACK_MIN_SDK_VERSION)"
  # This is definition of the min SDK version given to Jack for the current
  # platform. For released version it should be the same as
  # PLATFORM_SDK_VERSION. During development, this number may be incremented
  # before PLATFORM_SDK_VERSION if the plateform starts to add new java
  # language supports.
  PLATFORM_JACK_MIN_SDK_VERSION := 25
endif

ifeq "" "$(PLATFORM_VERSION_CODENAME)"
  # This is the current development code-name, if the build is not a final
  # release build.  If this is a final release build, it is simply "REL".
  PLATFORM_VERSION_CODENAME := REL

  # This is all of the development codenames that are active.  Should be either
  # the same as PLATFORM_VERSION_CODENAME or a comma-separated list of additional
  # codenames after PLATFORM_VERSION_CODENAME.
  PLATFORM_VERSION_ALL_CODENAMES := $(PLATFORM_VERSION_CODENAME)
endif

ifeq "REL" "$(PLATFORM_VERSION_CODENAME)"
  PLATFORM_PREVIEW_SDK_VERSION := 0
else
  ifeq "" "$(PLATFORM_PREVIEW_SDK_VERSION)"
    # This is the definition of a preview SDK version over and above the current
    # platform SDK version. Unlike the platform SDK version, a higher value
    # for preview SDK version does NOT mean that all prior preview APIs are
    # included. Packages reading this value to determine compatibility with
    # known APIs should check that this value is precisely equal to the preview
    # SDK version the package was built for, otherwise it should fall back to
    # assuming the device can only support APIs as of the previous official
    # public release.
    # This value will always be 0 for release builds.
    PLATFORM_PREVIEW_SDK_VERSION := 0
  endif
endif

ifeq "" "$(DEFAULT_APP_TARGET_SDK)"
  # This is the default minSdkVersion and targetSdkVersion to use for
  # all .apks created by the build system.  It can be overridden by explicitly
  # setting these in the .apk's AndroidManifest.xml.  It is either the code
  # name of the development build or, if this is a release build, the official
  # SDK version of this release.
  ifeq "REL" "$(PLATFORM_VERSION_CODENAME)"
    DEFAULT_APP_TARGET_SDK := $(PLATFORM_SDK_VERSION)
  else
    DEFAULT_APP_TARGET_SDK := $(PLATFORM_VERSION_CODENAME)
  endif
endif

ifeq "" "$(PLATFORM_SECURITY_PATCH)"
    #  Used to indicate the security patch that has been applied to the device.
    #  It must signify that the build includes all security patches issued up through the designated Android Public Security Bulletin.
    #  It must be of the form "YYYY-MM-DD" on production devices.
    #  It must match one of the Android Security Patch Level strings of the Public Security Bulletins.
    #  If there is no $PLATFORM_SECURITY_PATCH set, keep it empty.
    PLATFORM_SECURITY_PATCH := 2018-02-05
endif

ifeq "" "$(PLATFORM_BASE_OS)"
  # Used to indicate the base os applied to the device.
  # Can be an arbitrary string, but must be a single word.
  #
  # If there is no $PLATFORM_BASE_OS set, keep it empty.
  PLATFORM_BASE_OS :=
endif

ifeq "" "$(BUILD_ID)"
  # Used to signify special builds.  E.g., branches and/or releases,
  # like "M5-RC7".  Can be an arbitrary string, but must be a single
  # word and a valid file name.
  #
  # If there is no BUILD_ID set, make it obvious.
  BUILD_ID := UNKNOWN
endif

ifeq "" "$(BUILD_DATETIME)"
  # Used to reproduce builds by setting the same time. Must be the number
  # of seconds since the Epoch.
  BUILD_DATETIME := $(shell date +%s)
endif

ifneq (,$(findstring Darwin,$(shell uname -sm)))
DATE := date -r $(BUILD_DATETIME)
else
DATE := date -d @$(BUILD_DATETIME)
endif

ifeq "" "$(BUILD_NUMBER)"
  # BUILD_NUMBER should be set to the source control value that
  # represents the current state of the source code.  E.g., a
  # perforce changelist number or a git hash.  Can be an arbitrary string
  # (to allow for source control that uses something other than numbers),
  # but must be a single word and a valid file name.
  #
  # If no BUILD_NUMBER is set, create a useful "I am an engineering build
  # from this date/time" value.  Make it start with a non-digit so that
  # anyone trying to parse it as an integer will probably get "0".
  BUILD_NUMBER := eng.$(shell echo $${USER:0:6}).$(shell $(DATE) +%Y%m%d.%H%M%S)
endif

------------------------------------------------------------------------

modem patch P28~P29
MOLY00304129_ALPS03751055(For_AUS6739_66_N1_MOLY.LR12A.R2.MP.V1.P28)
#==============================================================================
# CR list from customer request
# ------------------------
# The release maybe include
#   1. The patch request from customer
#   2. The dependency patch of item 1

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00279464
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]] 
Add support for the multiple components of facility peer message.

[[Problem Description]] 
There was no support for the multiple components of facility peer message in MTK platforms and hence the second component was ignored

[[Potential Impact of the solution]] 
2 components will be handled in peer facility.

[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]

Patch Type:
  Customer Request
CR ID:
  ALPS03711560
Severity:
  
Description: 
  C300AE GCF AGPS fail 37.571-1	7.5-5
  [[Title fo***ustomer]]
  ***PP 37.571 Se***ion 7.5 Moving scenario timeout errorwork around
  [[Problem Description]]
  According to TS 37.571. Se***ion 7.5 Moving scenario and periodic update:
  "Ignore Erro***essages that the UE may report in LPP PROVIDE LOCATION I***O***ATION messages until it has been able to acquire the GNSS signals and reports the first GNSS Me***rement I***o***ation or Location I***o***ation."
  
  However, the spec does not take Hy*** *** ***o account. In MSA ***, when UE report less than 4 satallites me***rement, Server will treat it as 
  "timeout for the first report" and the whole *** fail.
  [[Potential Impa*** of the solution]]
  none
  [[Modules to be verified after taking p***h]]
  mnld
  [[問題標題]]
  ***PP 37.571 Se***ion 7.5 Moving scenario timeout errorwork around
  [[問題現象]]
  根据 TS 37.571. Se***ion 7.5 Moving scenario and periodic update:
  服务器可以忽略 LPP PROVIDE LOCATION I***O***ATION 中的任何error信息
  但实际测试中如果UE回报的卫星不足以定位，server会认为是timeout，这个应该是spec没有将hy***测试考虑入内（hy***可以回报仅仅一颗）
  [[解法可能帶來的影響]]
  (請填寫於此行下方，並描述如果合入這個p***h可能會有什麼trade off的改變，如perfo******e降低、UI改變等等)
  none
  [[建議驗證模塊]]
  (請填寫於此行下方，並建議客戶合了此p***h後要驗證哪些module或feature)
  mnldN/A

Associated Files: 
  vendor/ausshine/libs/mtk_agpsd/Android.mk
  vendor/ausshine/libs/mtk_agpsd/arm/mtk_agpsd
  vendor/mediatek/proprietary/hardware/connectivity/gps/mtk_mnld/mnl/inc/mtk_gps.h
  vendor/mediatek/proprietary/hardware/connectivity/gps/mtk_mnld/mnl/inc/mtk_gps_agps.h

Patch Type:
  Customer Request
CR ID:
  ALPS03695353
Severity:
  Critical
Description: 
  [Zion] PMIC - LPSD issue 
  [[Title fo***ustomer]]
  Rare probability to suffer extra leakage in LPSD.
  [[Problem Description]]
  1.	Non-default on LDOs may not be off after LPSD 
  2.	Extra leakage caused by these non-default on LDOs
  [[Potential Impa*** of the solution]]
  1. no side effe***
  [[Modules to be verified after taking p***h]]
  1.	RTCA power on and off related modules
  2.	LPSD related modules
  [[問題標題]]
  1. 有極小機率可能在做長壓電源按鍵關機後會觸發額外的漏電
  [[問題現象]]
  1.	在執行長壓電源按鍵關機後，非default on LDOs有極小機率會被打開
  2.	這些非default on LDOs 會產生額外的漏電
  [[解法可能帶來的影響]]

Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
user PLMN search can not find 3G cell sometimes
[[Problem Description]]
If a UARFCN is reused within same MCC between 2 operators, UE fails to show the 3G cell in user PLMN search
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
Verify whether there are frequency sharing happening between the operators and only then exclude frequency from scanning during manual PLMN selection.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Manual PLMN selection

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00296426
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
user PLMN search can not find 3G cell sometimes
[[Problem Description]]
If a UARFCN is reused within same MCC between 2 operators, UE fails to show the 3G cell in user PLMN search
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
Verify whether there are frequency sharing happening between the operators and only then exclude frequency from scanning during manual PLMN selection.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Manual PLMN selection
[[問題標題]]
user PLMN search can not find 3G cell sometimes
[[問題現象]]
If a UARFCN is reused within same MCC between 2 operators, UE fails to show the 3G cell in user PLMN search
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
Verify whether there are frequency sharing happening between the operators and only then exclude frequency from scanning during manual PLMN selection.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
Manual PLMN selection

MOLY00303416_ALPS03740677(For_AUS6739_66_N1_MOLY.LR12A.R2.MP.V1.P26)
#==============================================================================
# CR list from customer request
# ------------------------
# The release maybe include
#   1. The patch request from customer
#   2. The dependency patch of item 1
#==============================================================================

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00288058
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
WFC and VPN Coexist Patch
[[Problem Description]]
This is a WFC and VPN co-exist issue. 
On systems that use mark-based routing it may be necessary for
routing lookups to use marks in order for packets to be routed
correctly. An example of such a system is Android, which uses
socket marks to route packets via different networks.

Currently, routing lookups in tunnel mode always use a mark of
zero, making routing incorrect on such systems. This patch adds
a new output_mark parameter to the SA properties.  The mark will
be used in routing lookups, and if nonzero, will also set the
mark of the packets emitted by the SA, so it can be matched by
iptables.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
None
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
ePDG
[[問題標題]]
WFC and VPN Coexist Patch
[[問題現象]]
This is a WFC and VPN co-exist issue. 
On systems that use mark-based routing it may be necessary for
routing lookups to use marks in order for packets to be routed
correctly. An example of such a system is Android, which uses
socket marks to route packets via different networks.

Currently, routing lookups in tunnel mode always use a mark of
zero, making routing incorrect on such systems. This patch adds
a new output_mark parameter to the SA properties.  The mark will
be used in routing lookups, and if nonzero, will also set the
mark of the packets emitted by the SA, so it can be matched by
iptables.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
None
[[建議驗證模塊]]
ePDG
Associated Files:
  apps/module/strongswan/src/include/linux/xfrm.h
  apps/module/strongswan/src/libhydra/plugins/kernel_netlink/kernel_netlink_ipsec.c
  apps/mtk_rel/GEN93_USER/libs/arm/libhydra.so
  apps/mtk_rel/GEN93_USER/libs/arm64/libhydra.so

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00302622
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
Load preparation for A1/Austria
[[Problem Description]]
A1 Austria requires 30s handover lock 30s.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
Handover lock prevents the ping-pong effect of the UE performing handover between cellular and WiFi too often in low-signal area.
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
Cellular-WiFi handover scenarios in low-signal area. WFC needs to be enabled.
[[問題標題]]
Load preparation for A1/Austria
[[問題現象]]
A1 Austria requires 30s handover lock 30s. Also functionality to prevent unwanted WFC registration loop with non-VoLTE SIM needs to be enabled.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
Handover lock prevents the ping-pong effect of the UE performing handover between cellular and WiFi too often in low-signal area. Default WFC Attach retry functionality prevents UE attempting WFC registration process in uncontrolled way causing lot of network signalling.
[[建議驗證模塊]]
Cellular-WiFi handover scenarios in low-signal area. WFC needs to be enabled.
WFC registration attempts with SIM card without VoLTE subscription. WFC needs to be enabled.

  mcu/pcore/custom/modem/common/ps/custom_iwlan_config.c

MOLY00303416_ALPS03740677(For_AUS6739_66_N1_MOLY.LR12A.R2.MP.V1.P26)
#==============================================================================
# CR list from customer request
# ------------------------
# The release maybe include
#   1. The patch request from customer
#   2. The dependency patch of item 1
#==============================================================================

Patch Type:  Customer Request
CR ID:       MOLY00288058
Severity:    N/A
eService ID: N/A
Description:
  [[Title for Customer]]
WFC and VPN Coexist Patch
[[Problem Description]]
This is a WFC and VPN co-exist issue. 
On systems that use mark-based routing it may be necessary for
routing lookups to use marks in order for packets to be routed
correctly. An example of such a system is Android, which uses
socket marks to route packets via different networks.

Currently, routing lookups in tunnel mode always use a mark of
zero, making routing incorrect on such systems. This patch adds
a new output_mark parameter to the SA properties.  The mark will
be used in routing lookups, and if nonzero, will also set the
mark of the packets emitted by the SA, so it can be matched by
iptables.
[[Potential Impact of the solution]]
None
[[Modules to be verified after taking patch]]
ePDG
[[問題標題]]
WFC and VPN Coexist Patch
[[問題現象]]
This is a WFC and VPN co-exist issue. 
On systems that use mark-based routing it may be necessary for
routing lookups to use marks in order for packets to be routed
correctly. An example of such a system is Android, which uses
socket marks to route packets via different networks.

Currently, routing lookups in tunnel mode always use a mark of
zero, making routing incorrect on such systems. This patch adds
a new output_mark parameter to the SA properties.  The mark will
be used in routing lookups, and if nonzero, will also set the
mark of the packets emitted by the SA, so it can be matched by
iptables.
[[解法可能帶來的影響]]
None
[[建議驗證模塊]]
ePDG
Associated Files:
  apps/module/strongswan/src/include/linux/xfrm.h
  apps/module/strongswan/src/libhydra/plugins/kernel_netlink/kernel_netlink_ipsec.c
  apps/mtk_rel/GEN93_USER/libs/arm/libhydra.so
  apps/mtk_rel/GEN93_USER/libs/arm64/libhydra.so
